name: Superpixel
description:
A hard platforming game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare  23!

Since Flash is long gone, this requires a SWF player to play. I've found that    SWF2JS  works decently well.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows/Space: Move/Jump

Tech Used:

  • AS3 w/ Flashpunk by ChevyRay
  • SFXR
  • Audacity
  • Paint.NET
  • Musagi
